skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivational quote of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des: Motivational Quote of the Day and Daily Inspiration is a skill where Alexa recites a quote to uplift and motivate you to achieve your goals. If you never need a pick-me-up, open up this skill. You can listen to one quote a day or as many as you need to get you going. This skill is constantly being updated to add to it's pool of motivational quotes to provide users the best experience possible.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
